name: Megidramon

name: Sourai
effect: [Main] Trash the top 4 digivolution cards of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Until the end of your opponent's turn, all of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards can't attack.

name: God Flame
effect: [Main] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -6000 DP for the turn. Then, you may return 1 card with the [Four Great Dragons] trait from your trash to your hand.

name: Trial of the Four Great Dragons
effect: [Main] ＜Draw 1＞. Then, place this card in your battle area.[Main] ＜Delay＞ (By trashing this card in your battle area, activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)・Play 1 Digimon card with [Four Great Dragons] in its traits from your hand without paying the cost. The Digimon played by this effect can't digivolve to level 7, and at the end of your opponent's turn, delete that Digimon.
securityEffect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.
